"Marathon Training: Vopar":
"While we previously focused on combat
training, we now want to see you
aim for a certain clear time.
Compete with other ARKS members while
traversing the lecho marino area of
Vopar. Your performance is being
gauged, so good teamwork is a plus.

――――――――――――――――――――
Fracaso: Retirarse despues de ser incapacitado"
